|chip1 = Broadcom;BCM4331; |chip2 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip3 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip4 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; -->

|linuxdriv = |windriv =
